entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.8.0
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 2dd9e9b83c8cefd9ae56dc7a9b8400b47478397b: fix(engine): leave unaired episodes monitored (#18) (@jon4hz)

Other work

  • 684213e00b3afaf20f1382abaa157845e82bdcc0: refactor: task scheduler and better caching (#21) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.9.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • d2ff0e621260470144eb7bfda14c9c54bccd7b2b: feat(api): add endpoints for jellyfin plugin (#24) (@jon4hz)
  • 9a35d5ecfbdf8a31f16a4d2ec28db6b773a8b6cb: feat(engine): add size threshold filter (#22) (@jon4hz)

Documentation updates

  • aaa2e8da43124016218edd77045bc56b97c8e327: docs: update docs with cleanup_schedule (#25) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.10.0
entry.content:
Changelog

üí• Breaking Changes

  • 9808412df7b921a9149cb4e6309b0abd5f9b9bff: feat(engine)!: add support for streamystats (#35) (@jon4hz)
  • 5fcb9f125e32d30bef625aa76b9636e1161930aa: feat(engine)!: cleanup delay based on disk usage (#37) (@jon4hz)

üêõ Bug fixes

  • 6aa4e790f870fb8955221325ff5697b3e0fdd4c7: fix(api): correctly clear cache (#38) (@jon4hz)
  • 39b885dcb783ddc341e210f5ddd600f20a0565f6: fix(config): correctly apply env overrides and defaults (#36) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.10.1
entry.content:
Changelog

üêõ Bug fixes

  • f3cc4e141416f5646ac175782290ffed7e1d7f8e: fix: tag checking if there is no disk pressure (#44) (@jon4hz)

entry.title: New release for Jellysweep: v0.10.2
entry.content:
Changelog

üêõ Bug fixes

  • 8926133955826d9c3244312a3d9bd9e8a5d59523: fix: correctly handle for-sure tag and delete logic if disk usage was disabled (#53) (@jon4hz)
  • fcab767e93ad767ea02f7af485e432d972782149: fix: make sure username is always lowercase (#51) (@jon4hz)
  • cebbe3d9ce7383c2d4fa64bb050d2f78a07e4a5b: fix: remove keep-request tags after partial deletion (#55) (@jon4hz)
  • 0bce24cb81d299682a6b287c57c6761cd45b3498: fix: skip disk usage check if there is no threshold config (#52) (@jon4hz)
